Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional. 

Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

'The system shall provide a history report of changes made to the Activity or Event data': Functional

'The product shall prevent its data from incorrect data being introduced.': Non-functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The user interface shall have standard menus buttons for navigation'


Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The response time of general student management tasks shall take no longer than 5 seconds and the response time of schedule generation shall take no longer than 30 seconds.'


Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional. 

Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The product shall be able support 1000 simultaneous users.': Non-functional
'A new user must be able to be added to the system within 10 minutes. 90% of new users are able to log into the system within 10 minutes.': Non-functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system shall cater to 10 simultaneous users from 9am to 5pm.'


Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Students added to a cohort shall be eligible for the cohort’s Program of Study.'


Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional.

Now, classify the following given requirement: '100% of merchant services representatives shall be able to successfully perform a follow up action on a dispute case on the first encounter after completing the training course.'


Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The Disputes System shall provide view access capability for authorized users of the application.'


Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional. 

Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The Disputes System must provide different levels of access with regard to disputes case initiation and follow-up actions.': Functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Any disputes cases that have been closed for over 6 months must be purged from the online disputes database.'


Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Only valid data shall be entered into the system. No invalid data shall be entered into the system.'


Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product will function alongside server software on any operating system where the Java runtime can be installed.'


Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional.

The product shall display HTML properly in 80% of all HTML browsers tested (minimum is to test 8 browsers).'

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product shall be easy for customers with novice skills on the Internet to purchase and watch streaming movies. Customers should be able to purchase and watch a pre-determined movie in under 3 minutes.'


Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional. 

Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The website shall continue to operate if the payment gateway goes down.': Non-functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The website should cater to all tribes in Nigeria.'


Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional. 

Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system interface will use CCR nomenclature. The system must use the same nomenclature used in the existing WCS system and reports'


Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional. 

Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The WCS system shall use appropriate nomenclature and terminology as defined by the Corporate Community Grants organization. All interfaces and reports will undergo usability tests by CCR users.': Non-functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The RFS system should be available 24/7 especially during the budgeting period. The RFS system shall be available 90% of the time all year and 98% during the budgeting period. 2% of the time the system will become available within 1 hour of the time that the situation is reported.'


Please classify the given software requirements into functional requirement or non-functional requirement. The answer should be one word, i.e. Functional or Non-functional. 

Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'Only authorized user shall access the RFS system. ONLY users that exist in the UAS system with the RFS system assigned to their role(s) shall access the RFS system and use it.': Non-functional
'Only adjusters with a supervisor role can update preferred repair facility ratings. Users without the supervisor role cannot access the repair facility ratings.': Non-functional
'Changes to revenue and expense formulae must be applied to the RFS system every year prior to the budgeting process start. Revenue and expense formulae will be updated within one week of their receipt after which 2 weeks will be allotted to testing of the budget calculations to be conducted jointly by the project development team and PCG Finance.': Non-functional
'Only collision estimators shall search for recycled parts. Users without the collision estimator role shall not have access to the search for recycled parts.': Non-functional

'Only registered realtors shall be able to access the system.': Non-functional
